title: France: soaring with the senses. Parts 1 & 2
brief_description: Fast moving action and adventure as press attache Marie Francoise Guichard shows off the delights of France. Features a barge trip along the Canal du Midi, a journey by France’s latest triumph of technology to Corsica, a hot air balloon flight across the chateaux of the Loire Valley, Bastille Day celebrations in Paris with military parades and concerts, culminating in a climb up Mont Blanc and a parapente flight through the French Alps. Features characters such as Maurice Herzog and Paul Bocuse.
